pages.text: A $(l:intro/lead)lead$(/l) stew pot acts similarly as $(l:intro/stew_pots)its common counterpart$(/l), only that sugar of lead (as spice Defrutum) will be leached out into the stew if the stew were concentrated enough, or vinegar were added.
A $(l:intro/lead)lead$(/l)-plated frying pan act similarly as $(l:intro/frying_pans)its common counterpart$(/l), only that any vinegar added will turn into defrutum.
